meanings.definition: A day designated for play or recreation.
meanings.sent1: On our playdays, we go to the park and have fun playing games.
meanings.sent2: Saturday is always my favorite playday because I get to relax and enjoy myself.
meanings.sent3: The playdays at school are a nice break from studying and homework.
meanings.sent4: The weekend felt like a long playday, full of laughter and joy.
meanings.sent5: I cherish the memories of our family playdays at the beach.

meanings.definition: A period of time set aside for play or leisure activities.
meanings.sent1: During the summer, we have long playdays where we can swim and play outside all day.
meanings.sent2: The playdays during the holidays are a great way to unwind and have fun with friends.
meanings.sent3: Having a playday with friends can make even the gloomiest day brighter.
meanings.sent4: The playdays of childhood are like treasures we carry with us into adulthood.
meanings.sent5: I look forward to the weekend playdays when I can relax and enjoy some free time.
